main_menu.select_language_answer: You have set the language to {language}. To start using the bot, press 'Continue'
main_menu.start_message:
Ho-ho-ho! It's time to play Secret Santa!

Create your room for friends, or join an existing one.
main_menu.menu_reminder: ‚ùó Don't forget to update your contact information in the profile settings. ‚ùó Otherwise, Santa won't be able to send you a gift.
main_menu.about_message: Secret Santa is a game often played before Christmas or New Year in teams, families, or among friends. It's an adaptation of a game where you need to join one of the groups or create your own and invite your friends. In each group, every participant becomes a Secret Santa for the person whose name they draw. Then, each Secret Santa must prepare a gift for their recipient, remaining anonymous. Gifts should be sent to the address provided during the draw. At the end of the game, when all participants have received their gifts, players can reveal their secret identity and share their impressions of the gifts. This bot is completely free. Current limitations: One player can own only {room.user_rooms_count} rooms. If you encounter errors or have questions, you can contact @{support_account}

main_menu.menu_message: The data you provide is necessary for your Secret Santa to send you a gift. Your profile: {user_information} To ensure security, we encrypt the address and phone number in the database. If you want to change or delete your personal data, press Edit Profile
main_menu.profile_edit_message: Choose what you want to change:

change_address.change_address_first_msg: For your Secret Santa to send you a package, please provide the address where the package should be sent and don't forget to include: ‚Äî Country ‚Äî Region ‚Äî City ‚Äî Street ‚Äî House ‚Äî Apartment ‚Äî Floor* ‚Äî Intercom number if different from the apartment ‚Äî Postal code For example: Russia, Moscow Region, Fryazino, Pulkina St., House 99, Apt. 999, Floor 25, Postal code 123987.
change_address.error: Address data cannot exceed 150 characters. Try again.

change_name.change_name_first_msg: Hohoho, it's time to provide your details for Santa 🎅 Keep in mind it will be used to send a gift by Santa. First, write your first name
change_name.change_name_third_msg: First name and last name changed.

change_number.change_number_first_msg: Provide your phone number so that postal services can notify you about the gift. Enter your number using the format: +7|8(___)___-__-__ For example: +7 700 111 11 11
change_number.error: ‚ùåInvalid number format‚ùå Your message: {text}, try again. Try again. Enter your number using the format: +7|8(___)___-__-__ For example: +7 700 111 11 11

delete_information.delete_information_first_msg: Write confirm to delete your profile data.
delete_information.delete_information_second_msg: All your data has been deleted.
delete_information.error: You entered the wrong command. Try again. To confirm, enter the word "confirm"

main.text_control_room_not_scheduler: The draw time has not yet been set.
main.text_control_room_scheduler: 🕓 The game in the current room is scheduled for {next_time_run}
main.room_closed_uns: The game in room {room_number} has ended! Unfortunately, the number of players was insufficient for a full draw.
main.room_closed_uns_for_own: To reactivate the room, click Activate Room, invite more people, and set a new draw time.
main.room_closed_suc: The game in your room has ended! You became Secret Santa for: {user_information} You can send a message to your Secret Santa, or send a message to your recipient.

change_budget.long_budget:
You entered a message that is too long for the budget.
The message cannot exceed 16 characters
To change your budget, send a new message.
change_budget.change_budget_first_msg:
Specify a new budget for the players in your room for the Secret Santa gift.
Write the amount in any format, for example, 2000 tenge, 200 rubles, or $20

The message length should not exceed 16 characters.
change_budget.change_budget_second_msg: The budget for room {room_number} has been updated. New value: {new_budget}

change_owner.error: This participant cannot be appointed as the room owner.
change_owner.change_owner_room_first_msg: Want to change the room owner? The new owner must be a participant in the room. Keep in mind, you will lose control of the room. To change the owner, write their nickname.
change_owner.change_owner_room_second_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 I changed the owner, now it's {new_owner}

create_new_room.limit: A new room cannot be created, as you have reached the limit. You can own up to 10 rooms.
create_new_room.long_room_name:
You entered a name that is too long, please come up with another one.
The room name must not exceed 16 characters.
create_new_room.long_budget:
You entered a message that is too long for the budget.
The message cannot exceed 16 characters
To change your budget, send a new message.
create_new_room.create_new_room_first_msg:
Ho-ho-ho! 🎅

What would you like to name your room?
Write its name, and we'll proceed

The name must not exceed 16 characters.
create_new_room.create_new_room_second_msg: Accepted! Your room name is {room_name} Now specify the maximum budget for the Secret Santa gift. Write the amount in any format, for example, 2000 tenge, 200 rubles, or $20 The message length should not exceed 16 characters.
create_new_room.create_new_room_third_msg: Accepted! Your budget is {room_budget} And the last question. Write your gift preferences. Perhaps you have a hobby, and you'd like something special?
create_new_room.create_new_room_forth_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 The room "{room_name}" has been created. Here is the room number {room.number} Share this code with your friends so they can join your game.
create_new_room.create_new_room_additional_msg: In the meantime, you can go back and update your profile.

delete_room.delete_room_first_msg: ‚ùåThe room will be deleted without the possibility of recovery. To confirm the deletion of room {room_number}, enter confirm in the chat.
delete_room.delete_room_second_msg:
The room has been successfully deleted

 You can create a new room in the main menu.
delete_room.error_command_verif: You entered the wrong command {text} for confirmation. To confirm the deletion of room {room_number}, enter confirm in the chat.
delete_room.error: Something went wrong, the room was not deleted.

subscribe.already_joined: You are already in this room.
subscribe.number_error: The room number can contain only digits, try again.
subscribe.room_is_not_exist_or_closed:
The room you entered does not exist, or the game is over.
Enter a valid room number.
subscribe.subscribe_first_msg:
Ho-ho-ho! 🎅

Enter the room number you want to join.
subscribe.subscribe_second_msg:
Now write your gift preferences. Perhaps you have a hobby, and you'd like something special?
Your comments will help Secret Santa choose a gift for you.
subscribe.subscribe_third_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 You joined the room {room_number}. Now you can play with your friends. Stay tuned for announcements from the room owner. Have a great game! 😋

unsubscribe.unsubscribe_second_msg: You can return to the room at any time by using room number {room_number}.

update_room.long_name:
You entered a name that is too long, please come up with another one.
The room name must not exceed 16 characters.
update_room.unsubscribe_first_msg:
'Enter a new name for your room.
The name must not exceed 16 characters
update_room.unsubscribe_second_msg: The room name has been changed to {new_room_name}

start_game.time_zone_inf: ‚ö†Ô∏è Your time zone is not set. To set the correct time, you need to specify your time zone, otherwise the server time will be used.
start_game.count_players: At least 3 participants are required to start the game
start_game.time_not_set: Time is not set At least 3 participants are required to start the game Your time zone: {timezone}
start_game.time_set_to: The mailing date is set for {datetime_set_to}
start_game.incorrect_datetime:
You entered an incorrect date.

 Try again and enter the correct draw date.
start_game.start_game_first_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 To set the mailing time, send a message in the format yyyy.mm.dd h:m - year.month.day hour:minutes Example: 2023.12.01 12:00

time_zone_menu.letter_of_country: To change the time zone, select the letter that your country starts with:

message_to_recipient.first_msg: Write the message you want to send to your recipient. 🙍‍‚ôÇ
message_to_recipient.msg_was_sent: Your message to the recipient has been sent.

message_to_sender.first_msg: Write the message you want to send to your Secret Santa. 🎅
message_to_sender.msg_was_sent: Your message to Santa has been sent

message_formatter.address_is_not_specified: The player did not provide their address, contact the participant via chat to clarify the information
message_formatter.number_is_not_specified: The player did not provide their contact number, contact the participant via chat to clarify the information

result_mailing.message_text: You received this message because the mailing for your room [{room_name}] was set for this date. Unfortunately, there are not enough active players in your room. There should be 3 or more active players. Invite more players and set a new draw date
